short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is designed for the communications industry. It Calculates lowest attach point for communications, based on lowest power.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate Your Networkâ€™s Compliance with Precision: 

Introducing the Compliance Calculator! A simple yet essential tool for the communications industry. The Compliance Calculator ensures your infrastructure meets regulatory heights with ease. 

Designed to calculate compliance height for communications, based on the height of the lowest power component on a utility pole, or midspan. This tool is the key to maintaining impeccable standards, and optimal performance. Say goodbye to guess-work and hello to hassle-free compliance!

The Compliance Calculator works great in tandem with programs like Katapult Pro, or any Industry standard program where height calculations are required. The regulatory guidelines are based on the current OSHA and NESC guidelines governing communications space on utility poles at 40" below power.
